reviewText:
This is one of the most funny movies ever made by "Cantinflas", the mexican comediant of whom Charlie Chaplin reffered to as the best in the world.
Unfortunately, his humor is somewhat local since his trademark is to talk a lot whithout saying a thing using very mexican expressions, it's almost impossible to translate.
Nevertheless this is a must-have for those interested in the golden age of mexican films.
Excellent quality of product i am very satisfied with the my purchase
Not his top movie but pretty good
I choose this rating because the man is a legend and his movies never fail. There's always a good laugh.
We LOVE Cantiflas!  He is a legend & HILARIOUS.  Great DVD & I was so thrilled to find his movies at good prices.

I am very happy to be able to finally get Cantinflas movies in DVD. This is one of his many great movies. Very good quality of the DVD, sound, and timely delivered. I definitely recommend this seller.
